description.originalText: I hired Milena for babysitting my two boys on a regular basis on weekends. I cannot recommend her enough. She’s prompt, responsive and flexible if there’s a slight change of plans. More importantly, she is always amazing with my kids - which is rare to have such consistency! From day I, Milena connected with the boys by accommodating their personalities and leaning into their interests. She’s patient, calm and in control.When it’s rainy, I’ll find her playing happily with the kids, and very rarely resorting to screen time. She helps prepare meals and cleans up! Milena is a blessing one rarely finds.

description.displayText: Milena watched our 3 month old in our hotel both nights while we attended a wedding in NYC. She was very professional and successfully did the bedtime feeding and put her to bed (first time anyone other than myself did this!). We felt very comfortable having Milena watch our daughter and would definitely use her again when in NYC.
description.originalText: Milena watched our 3 month old in our hotel both nights while we attended a wedding in NYC. She was very professional and successfully did the bedtime feeding and put her to bed (first time anyone other than myself did this!). We felt very comfortable having Milena watch our daughter and would definitely use her again when in NYC.

description.displayText: Milena has been watching both of my daughters for 4 months now at least twice a week (since they were 2 years 2 months, now 2 1/2 and 5 months, now almost 9 months old) and I couldn't recommend her more! My girls immediately felt comfortable with her and her focus was on the kids, engaging with them right away. She has done bedtime routines and nap time for the both of them often (on multiple floors of the house). She has also been helping my oldest daughter with potty training and my youngest with baby led weaning while I'm away! She's always smiling and my house always looks so nice and tidy when I return! Bottles and toddler dishes washed and the playroom/living room picked up! My oldest always asks when she's coming next and my youngest gets the biggest smile being handed off to her. We love Milena!

description.displayText: Milena occasionally babysits our 9-month old daughter to our great satisfaction. She's dependable, punctual and a clear communicator. You can tell Milena is very experienced and enjoys working with children. Our daughter has been very fond of her from the very first time they met. Milena's excellent care also includes giving our daughter her last feeding of the day (oatmeal and yogurt) and then putting her to sleep for the night. We highly recommend Milena as a babysitter.

description.displayText:
Milena has watched my som since he was 3 months old. She watched him full time for a year and has babysat him for the past 2 years. She is the most amazing, loving and caring person I have ever come across. My son absolutely loves her. He runs to her when she comes through the door. 

She is great with babies and toddlers. I cannot recommend her enough.

description.displayText: Milena has done occasional babysitting for my family. She has been working with us since my child was 4 months old. Milena is mature, punctual, organized, independent, kind, safety conscious and reliable. Our child loves her and so do we. She is also very respectful and trustworthy. She has a huge experience with kids. Highly recommended!

She has a huge experience with kids. Highly recommended!

description.displayText: Over the last three years Milena has watched my 3 year old, and most recently newborn, helping out on nights and weekends.  She dependable, knowledgeable and is joy to have around our children.  Highly recommend.

description.displayText: Milena was our Au Pair and cared for our three children for one year. She loved our children like they were her own. She was responsible, reliable, and dependable. She has an abundance of experience caring for children of all ages and she is extremely trustworthy. Not only did we love her, our children adored her as well.
